result.arabic_text: وَإِذۡ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكَ لَيَبۡعَثَنَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ مَن يَسُومُهُمۡ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَسَرِيعُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
result.translation: Yeroo Gooftaan kee hanga Guyyaa Qiyaamatti isaan irratti nama adabbii laalessaa isaan dhandhamsiisu akka isaan irratti ergu beeksise (yaadadhu.) Dhugumatti, Gooftaan kee adabbiin isaa arifataadha; Inni akkaan araaramaa, akkaan rahmata godhaadha.
